Message: Today I am feeling tired and I am not in the mood to train.

It's completely natural to have off days, but let's try to focus on how much your body needs rejuvenation after this short session. Together, we'll take it easy, and I'll closely monitor your progress to ensure a positive experience. Remember, every effort counts, even if it
Today is a good day, but I dont think that I will manage to train for marathon as I would like to.

Regarding your goals, consistency is key, and we should celebrate small victories along the way. Even if today falls a bit short of expectations, we can still work on building endurance, technique, or mental fortitude. Let's make the most of the time we have, and I'll be here
Today I am sad and I dont know if training could help me get better.

Emotions ebb and flow, and sometimes they don't align with our plans. Physical activity may not directly solve your sadness, but it can positively impact your well-being by releasing endorphins. If you feel up to it, we can take a gentle approach, focusing on what feels right
